title: Daniele Cannatella
text:
I’m an urban planner with a landscape architecture background, specializing in digital mapping, spatial analysis, and urban analytics.
My research develops data-driven, nature-based strategies to help cities adapt to climate change while promoting equity and sustainability.
As Assistant Professor of Urban Data Science at TU Delft, I combine research, teaching, and design to advance evidence-based decision-making in urban and territorial planning.
